Synopsis: A woman who moves into an apartment across the hall from two brilliant but socially awkward physicists shows them how little they know about life outside of the laboratory.

Title: Friends
Cast: Stars:, Jennifer Aniston, , Courteney Cox, , Lisa Kudrow, , Matt LeBlanc
Synopsis: Follows the personal and professional lives of six twenty to thirty year-old friends living in the Manhattan borough of New York City.

Title: Outlander
Cast: Stars:, Caitríona Balfe, , Sam Heughan, , Sophie Skelton, , Richard Rankin
Synopsis: Claire Beauchamp Randall, a nurse in World War II, mysteriously goes back in time to Scotland in 1743. There, she meets a dashing Highland warrior and gets drawn into an epic rebellion.

Title: Bones
Cast: Stars:, Emily Deschanel, , David Boreanaz, , Michaela Conlin, , T.J. Thyne
Synopsis: Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones.

Title: Firefly Lane
Cast: Stars:, Katherine Heigl, , Sarah Chalke, , Ben Lawson, , Ali Skovbye
Synopsis: Tully and Kate support each other through good times and bad with an unbreakable bond that carries them from their teens to their forties.

Title: House of the Dragon
Cast: Stars:, Matt Smith, , Graham McTavish, , Steve Toussaint, , Eve Best
Synopsis: An internal succession war within House Targaryen at the height of its power, 172 years before the birth of Daenerys Targaryen.

Title: Ghosted
Cast: Director:, Dexter Fletcher, | ,     Stars:, Chris Evans, , Ana de Armas, , Adrien Brody, , Mike Moh
Synopsis: Cole falls head over heels for enigmatic Sadie, but then makes the shocking discovery that she's a secret agent. Before they can decide on a second date, Cole and Sadie are swept away on an international adventure to save the world.

Title: Vikings
Cast: Stars:, Katheryn Winnick, , Gustaf Skarsgård, , Alexander Ludwig, , Georgia Hirst
Synopsis: Vikings transports us to the brutal and mysterious world of Ragnar Lothbrok, a Viking warrior and farmer who yearns to explore--and raid--the distant shores across the ocean.

Title: A Beautiful Life
Cast: Director:, Mehdi Avaz, | ,     Stars:, Christopher, , Inga Ibsdotter Lilleaas, , Christine Albeck Børge, , Ardalan Esmaili
Synopsis: Elliott, a young fisherman with an extraordinary voice, gets the chance of a lifetime when high-profile music manager Suzanne discovers him at a party.

Title: Sex and the City
Cast: Stars:, Sarah Jessica Parker, , Kim Cattrall, , Kristin Davis, , Cynthia Nixon
Synopsis: Four female New Yorkers gossip about their sex lives (or lack thereof) and find new ways to deal with being a woman in the late 1990s.

Title: Three Thousand Years of Longing
Cast: Director:, George Miller, | ,     Stars:, Tilda Swinton, , Idris Elba, , Erdil Yasaroglu, , Sarah Houbolt
Synopsis: A lonely scholar, on a trip to Istanbul, discovers a Djinn who offers her three wishes in exchange for his freedom.

Title: Peter Pan & Wendy
Cast: Director:, David Lowery, | ,     Stars:, Alexander Molony, , Ever Anderson, , Jude Law, , Alyssa Wapanatâhk
Synopsis: Follow the adventures of Peter Pan, a boy who does not want to grow up, and how he recruits three siblings in London, and together they embark on a magical adventure on the enchanted island of Neverland.

Title: You
Cast: Stars:, Penn Badgley, , Victoria Pedretti, , Tati Gabrielle, , Ambyr Childers
Synopsis: A dangerously charming, intensely obsessive young man goes to extreme measures to insert himself into the lives of those he is transfixed by.

Title: Superman & Lois
Cast: Stars:, Tyler Hoechlin, , Elizabeth Tulloch, , Alex Garfin, , Erik Valdez
Synopsis: The world's most famous superhero and comic books' most famous journalist face the pressures and complexities that come with balancing work, justice, and parenthood in today's society.

Title: Love Again
Cast: Director:, Jim Strouse, | ,     Stars:, Priyanka Chopra Jonas, , Sam Heughan, , Céline Dion, , Sofia Barclay
Synopsis: A young woman tries to ease the pain of her fiancé's death by sending romantic texts to his old cell phone number, and forms a connection with the man the number has been reassigned to.

Title: How I Met Your Mother
Cast: Stars:, Josh Radnor, , Jason Segel, , Cobie Smulders, , Neil Patrick Harris
Synopsis: A father recounts to his children - through a series of flashbacks - the journey he and his four best friends took leading up to him meeting their mother.

Title: Castle
Cast: Stars:, Nathan Fillion, , Stana Katic, , Susan Sullivan, , Jon Huertas
Synopsis: After a serial killer imitates the plots of his novels, successful mystery novelist Richard "Rick" Castle receives permission from the Mayor of New York City to tag along with an NYPD homicide investigation team for research purposes.

Title: That '70s Show
Cast: Stars:, Topher Grace, , Laura Prepon, , Mila Kunis, , Danny Masterson
Synopsis: A comedy revolving around a group of teenage friends, their mishaps, and their coming of age, set in 1970s Wisconsin.

Title: The Vampire Diaries
Cast: Stars:, Nina Dobrev, , Paul Wesley, , Ian Somerhalder, , Kat Graham
Synopsis: The lives, loves, dangers and disasters in the town, Mystic Falls, Virginia. Creatures of unspeakable horror lurk beneath this town as a teenage girl is suddenly torn between two vampire brothers.

Title: And Just Like That...
Cast: Stars:, Sarah Jessica Parker, , Cynthia Nixon, , Kristin Davis, , Sara Ramirez
Synopsis: The series follows Carrie, Miranda, and Charlotte as they navigate the journey from the complicated reality of life and friendship in their 30s to the even more complicated reality of life and friendship in their 50s.

Title: Daisy Jones & The Six
Cast: Stars:, Riley Keough, , Sam Claflin, , Camila Morrone, , Suki Waterhouse
Synopsis: Following the rise of rock band Daisy Jones and The Six through the 1970s Los Angeles music scene on their quest for worldwide icon status.

Title: Titanic
Cast: Director:, James Cameron, | ,     Stars:, Leonardo DiCaprio, , Kate Winslet, , Billy Zane, , Kathy Bates
Synopsis: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

Title: The Summer I Turned Pretty
Cast: Stars:, Lola Tung, , Jackie Chung, , Rachel Blanchard, , Christopher Briney
Synopsis: A love triangle between one girl and two brothers. A story about first love, first heartbreak, and the magic of that one perfect summer.

Title: Two and a Half Men
Cast: Stars:, Jon Cryer, , Ashton Kutcher, , Angus T. Jones, , Conchata Ferrell
Synopsis: A hedonistic jingle writer's free-wheeling life comes to an abrupt halt when his brother and 10-year-old nephew move into his beach-front house.

Title: New Girl

Synopsis: After a bad break-up, Jess, an offbeat young woman, moves into an apartment loft with three single men. Although they find her behavior very unusual, the men support her - most of the time.

Title: Buffy the Vampire Slayer
Cast: Stars:, Sarah Michelle Gellar, , Nicholas Brendon, , Alyson Hannigan, , Anthony Head
Synopsis: A young woman, destined to slay vampires, demons and other infernal creatures, deals with her life fighting evil, with the help of her friends.

Synopsis: While navigating the troubled waters of romance, school and family, Archie and his gang become entangled in dark Riverdale mysteries.

Synopsis: Elliott, a young fisherman with an extraordinary voice, gets the chance of a lifetime when high-profile music manager Suzanne discovers him at a party.

Title: Sex and the City

Synopsis: Four female New Yorkers gossip about their sex lives (or lack thereof) and find new ways to deal with being a woman in the late 1990s.

Synopsis: A lonely scholar, on a trip to Istanbul, discovers a Djinn who offers her three wishes in exchange for his freedom.

Title: Peter Pan & Wendy

Synopsis: Follow the adventures of Peter Pan, a boy who does not want to grow up, and how he recruits three siblings in London, and together they embark on a magical adventure on the enchanted island of Neverland.

Cast: Stars:, Penn Badgley, , Victoria Pedretti, , Tati Gabrielle, , Ambyr Childers
Synopsis: A dangerously charming, intensely obsessive young man goes to extreme measures to insert himself into the lives of those he is transfixed by.

Title: Superman & Lois
Cast: Stars:, Tyler Hoechlin, , Elizabeth Tulloch, , Alex Garfin, , Erik Valdez
Synopsis: The world's most famous superhero and comic books' most famous journalist face the pressures and complexities that come with balancing work, justice, and parenthood in today's society.

Title: Love Again
Cast: Director:, Jim Strouse, | ,     Stars:, Priyanka Chopra Jonas, , Sam Heughan, , Céline Dion, , Sofia Barclay
Synopsis: A young woman tries to ease the pain of her fiancé's death by sending romantic texts to his old cell phone number, and forms a connection with the man the number has been reassigned to.

Title: How I Met Your Mother
Cast: Stars:, Josh Radnor, , Jason Segel, , Cobie Smulders, , Neil Patrick Harris
Synopsis: A father recounts to his children - through a series of flashbacks - the journey he and his four best friends took leading up to him meeting their mother.

Title: Castle
Cast: Stars:, Nathan Fillion, , Stana Katic, , Susan Sullivan, , Jon Huertas
Synopsis: After a serial killer imitates the plots of his novels, successful mystery novelist Richard "Rick" Castle receives permission from the Mayor of New York City to tag along with an NYPD homicide investigation team for research purposes.

Title: That '70s Show
Cast: Stars:, Topher Grace, , Laura Prepon, , Mila Kunis, , Danny Masterson
Synopsis: A comedy revolving around a group of teenage friends, their mishaps, and their coming of age, set in 1970s Wisconsin.

Title: The Vampire Diaries
Cast: Stars:, Nina Dobrev, , Paul Wesley, , Ian Somerhalder, , Kat Graham
Synopsis: The lives, loves, dangers and disasters in the town, Mystic Falls, Virginia. Creatures of unspeakable horror lurk beneath this town as a teenage girl is suddenly torn between two vampire brothers.

Title: And Just Like That...
Cast: Stars:, Sarah Jessica Parker, , Cynthia Nixon, , Kristin Davis, , Sara Ramirez
Synopsis: The series follows Carrie, Miranda, and Charlotte as they navigate the journey from the complicated reality of life and friendship in their 30s to the even more complicated reality of life and friendship in their 50s.

Title: Daisy Jones & The Six
Cast: Stars:, Riley Keough, , Sam Claflin, , Camila Morrone, , Suki Waterhouse
Synopsis: Following the rise of rock band Daisy Jones and The Six through the 1970s Los Angeles music scene on their quest for worldwide icon status.

Title: Titanic
Cast: Director:, James Cameron, | ,     Stars:, Leonardo DiCaprio, , Kate Winslet, , Billy Zane, , Kathy Bates

Title: Two and a Half Men
Cast: Stars:, Jon Cryer, , Ashton Kutcher, , Angus T. Jones, , Conchata Ferrell

Cast: Stars:, Sarah Michelle Gellar, , Nicholas Brendon, , Alyson Hannigan, , Anthony Head

Synopsis: Beca, a freshman at Barden University, is cajoled into joining The Bellas, her school's all-girls singing group. Injecting some much needed energy into their repertoire, The Bellas take on their male rivals in a campus competition.

Synopsis: A young woman with a troubled past is drawn to a small town in Maine where fairy tales are to be believed.

Synopsis: On an island of haves and have-nots, teen John B enlists his three best friends to hunt for a legendary treasure linked to his father's disappearance.

Synopsis: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

Synopsis: After a serial killer imitates the plots of his novels, successful mystery novelist Richard "Rick" Castle receives permission from the Mayor of New York City to tag along with an NYPD homicide investigation team for research purposes.

Title: That '70s Show
Cast: Stars:, Topher Grace, , Laura Prepon, , Mila Kunis, , Danny Masterson
Synopsis: A comedy revolving around a group of teenage friends, their mishaps, and their coming of age, set in 1970s Wisconsin.

Title: The Vampire Diaries
Cast: Stars:, Nina Dobrev, , Paul Wesley, , Ian Somerhalder, , Kat Graham
Synopsis: The lives, loves, dangers and disasters in the town, Mystic Falls, Virginia. Creatures of unspeakable horror lurk beneath this town as a teenage girl is suddenly torn between two vampire brothers.

Title: And Just Like That...
Cast: Stars:, Sarah Jessica Parker, , Cynthia Nixon, , Kristin Davis, , Sara Ramirez
Synopsis: The series follows Carrie, Miranda, and Charlotte as they navigate the journey from the complicated reality of life and friendship in their 30s to the even more complicated reality of life and friendship in their 50s.

Title: Daisy Jones & The Six
Cast: Stars:, Riley Keough, , Sam Claflin, , Camila Morrone, , Suki Waterhouse
Synopsis: Following the rise of rock band Daisy Jones and The Six through the 1970s Los Angeles music scene on their quest for worldwide icon status.

Title: Titanic
Cast: Director:, James Cameron, | ,     Stars:, Leonardo DiCaprio, , Kate Winslet, , Billy Zane, , Kathy Bates
Synopsis: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

Title: The Summer I Turned Pretty
Cast: Stars:, Lola Tung, , Jackie Chung, , Rachel Blanchard, , Christopher Briney
Synopsis: A love triangle between one girl and two brothers. A story about first love, first heartbreak, and the magic of that one perfect summer.

Title: Two and a Half Men
Cast: Stars:, Jon Cryer, , Ashton Kutcher, , Angus T. Jones, , Conchata Ferrell
Synopsis: A hedonistic jingle writer's free-wheeling life comes to an abrupt halt when his brother and 10-year-old nephew move into his beach-front house.

Title: New Girl
Cast: Stars:, Zooey Deschanel, , Jake Johnson, , Max Greenfield, , Hannah Simone
Synopsis: After a bad break-up, Jess, an offbeat young woman, moves into an apartment loft with three single men. Although they find her behavior very unusual, the men support her - most of the time.

Title: Buffy the Vampire Slayer
Cast: Stars:, Sarah Michelle Gellar, , Nicholas Brendon, , Alyson Hannigan, , Anthony Head
Synopsis: A young woman, destined to slay vampires, demons and other infernal creatures, deals with her life fighting evil, with the help of her friends.

Title: Riverdale
Cast: Stars:, Lili Reinhart, , Camila Mendes, , Cole Sprouse, , K.J. Apa
Synopsis: While navigating the troubled waters of romance, school and family, Archie and his gang become entangled in dark Riverdale mysteries.

Title: Thor: Love and Thunder
Cast: Director:, Taika Waititi, | ,     Stars:, Chris Hemsworth, , Natalie Portman, , Christian Bale, , Tessa Thompson
Synopsis: Thor enlists the help of Valkyrie, Korg and ex-girlfriend Jane Foster to fight Gorr the God Butcher, who intends to make the gods extinct.

Title: Where the Crawdads Sing
Cast: Director:, Olivia Newman, | ,     Stars:, Daisy Edgar-Jones, , Taylor John Smith, , Harris Dickinson, , David Strathairn
Synopsis: A woman who raised herself in the marshes of the Deep South becomes a suspect in the murder of a man with whom she was once involved.

Synopsis: A spinoff of the original John Travolta and Olivia Newton John 1978 musical.

Synopsis: The lives, loves and losses of the doctors and nurses of Chicago's County General Hospital.

Cast: Director:, Sam Taylor-Johnson, | ,     Stars:, Dakota Johnson, , Jamie Dornan, , Jennifer Ehle, , Eloise Mumford
Synopsis: Literature student Anastasia Steele's life changes forever when she meets handsome, yet tormented, billionaire Christian Grey.

Title: Station 19
Cast: Stars:, Jaina Lee Ortiz, , Jason George, , Grey Damon, , Barrett Doss
Synopsis: This spinoff of the critically acclaimed show Grey's Anatomy follows the lives of the men and women of firehouse station 19 in Seattle, Washington.

Title: Pitch Perfect

Synopsis: Beca, a freshman at Barden University, is cajoled into joining The Bellas, her school's all-girls singing group. Injecting some much needed energy into their repertoire, The Bellas take on their male rivals in a campus competition.

Title: Once Upon a Time
Cast: Stars:, Ginnifer Goodwin, , Jennifer Morrison, , Lana Parrilla, , Robert Carlyle
Synopsis: A young woman with a troubled past is drawn to a small town in Maine where fairy tales are to be believed.

Title: True Blood
Cast: Stars:, Anna Paquin, , Stephen Moyer, , Sam Trammell, , Ryan Kwanten
Synopsis: Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire.

Title: One Tree Hill
Cast: Stars:, Chad Michael Murray, , James Lafferty, , Hilarie Burton, , Bethany Joy Lenz
Synopsis: Half-brothers Lucas and Nathan Scott trade between kinship and rivalry both on the basketball court and in the hearts of their friends in the small, but not so quiet town of Tree Hill, North Carolina.

Title: Outer Banks
Cast: Stars:, Chase Stokes, , Madelyn Cline, , Madison Bailey, , J.D.
Synopsis: On an island of haves and have-nots, teen John B enlists his three best friends to hunt for a legendary treasure linked to his father's disappearance.

Title: Forrest Gump
Cast: Director:, Robert Zemeckis, | ,     Stars:, Tom Hanks, , Robin Wright, , Gary Sinise, , Sally Field
Synopsis: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

Title: The Little Mermaid
Cast: Director:, Rob Marshall, | ,     Stars:, Halle Bailey, , Jonah Hauer-King, , Melissa McCarthy, , Javier Bardem
Synopsis: A young mermaid makes a deal with a sea witch to trade her beautiful voice for human legs so she can discover the world above water and impress a prince.

Cast: Stars:, India Amarteifio, , Adjoa Andoh, , Michelle Fairley, , Ruth Gemmell
Synopsis: Betrothed against her will to King George, young Charlotte arrives in London on her wedding day and faces scrutiny from the monarch's cunning mother.

Title: Platonic
Cast: Stars:, Rose Byrne, , Seth Rogen, , Tre Hale, , Andrew Lopez
Synopsis: Former childhood best friends reconnect as adults and try to get past the rift that led to their falling out.

Title: Grey's Anatomy
Cast: Stars:, Ellen Pompeo, , Chandra Wilson, , James Pickens Jr., , Justin Chambers
Synopsis: A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors.

Title: XO, Kitty
Cast: Stars:, Anna Cathcart, , Minyeong Choi, , Gia Kim, , Sang Heon Lee
Synopsis: A new love story unfolds when teen matchmaker Kitty reunites with her long-distance boyfriend at the same boarding school attended by her late mother.

Title: Fake Profile
Cast: Stars:, Carolina Miranda, , Rodolfo Salas, , Juanse Díez, , Manuela González
Synopsis: Camila creates a sexy profile on the online dating app Spice looking for the man of her dreams. But her dreams quickly turn into nightmares, and Camila ends up falling into a web of sex, lies, and deception.

Title: The Little Mermaid
Cast: Directors:, Ron Clements, , John Musker, | ,     Stars:, Jodi Benson, , Samuel E. Wright, , Rene Auberjonois, , Christopher Daniel Barnes
Synopsis: A mermaid princess makes a Faustian bargain in an attempt to become human and win a prince's love.

Title: Bridgerton
Cast: Stars:, Nicola Coughlan, , Julie Andrews, , Luke Newton, , Luke Thompson

Title: Modern Family

Synopsis: Three different but related families face trials and tribulations in their own uniquely comedic ways.

Title: The Big Bang Theory

Title: Friends
Cast: Stars:, Jennifer Aniston, , Courteney Cox, , Lisa Kudrow, , Matt LeBlanc
Synopsis: Follows the personal and professional lives of six twenty to thirty year-old friends living in the Manhattan borough of New York City.

Title: Outlander
Cast: Stars:, Caitríona Balfe, , Sam Heughan, , Sophie Skelton, , Richard Rankin
Synopsis: Claire Beauchamp Randall, a nurse in World War II, mysteriously goes back in time to Scotland in 1743. There, she meets a dashing Highland warrior and gets drawn into an epic rebellion.

Title: Bones
Cast: Stars:, Emily Deschanel, , David Boreanaz, , Michaela Conlin, , T.J. Thyne
Synopsis: Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones.

Cast: Stars:, Katherine Heigl, , Sarah Chalke, , Ben Lawson, , Ali Skovbye

Synopsis: Cole falls head over heels for enigmatic Sadie, but then makes the shocking discovery that she's a secret agent. Before they can decide on a second date, Cole and Sadie are swept away on an international adventure to save the world.

Synopsis: Beca, a freshman at Barden University, is cajoled into joining The Bellas, her school's all-girls singing group. Injecting some much needed energy into their repertoire, The Bellas take on their male rivals in a campus competition.

Title: Once Upon a Time
Cast: Stars:, Ginnifer Goodwin, , Jennifer Morrison, , Lana Parrilla, , Robert Carlyle
Synopsis: A young woman with a troubled past is drawn to a small town in Maine where fairy tales are to be believed.

Title: True Blood
Cast: Stars:, Anna Paquin, , Stephen Moyer, , Sam Trammell, , Ryan Kwanten
Synopsis: Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire.

Title: One Tree Hill
Cast: Stars:, Chad Michael Murray, , James Lafferty, , Hilarie Burton, , Bethany Joy Lenz
Synopsis: Half-brothers Lucas and Nathan Scott trade between kinship and rivalry both on the basketball court and in the hearts of their friends in the small, but not so quiet town of Tree Hill, North Carolina.

Title: Outer Banks
Cast: Stars:, Chase Stokes, , Madelyn Cline, , Madison Bailey, , J.D.
Synopsis: On an island of haves and have-nots, teen John B enlists his three best friends to hunt for a legendary treasure linked to his father's disappearance.

Title: Forrest Gump
Cast: Director:, Robert Zemeckis, | ,     Stars:, Tom Hanks, , Robin Wright, , Gary Sinise, , Sally Field
Synopsis: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

Title: The Little Mermaid
Cast: Director:, Rob Marshall, | ,     Stars:, Halle Bailey, , Jonah Hauer-King, , Melissa McCarthy, , Javier Bardem
Synopsis: A young mermaid makes a deal with a sea witch to trade her beautiful voice for human legs so she can discover the world above water and impress a prince.

Title: Asteroid City

Synopsis: The itinerary of a Junior Stargazer convention is spectacularly disrupted by world-changing events.

Title: Queen Charlotte: A Bridgerton Story
Cast: Stars:, India Amarteifio, , Adjoa Andoh, , Michelle Fairley, , Ruth Gemmell
Synopsis: Betrothed against her will to King George, young Charlotte arrives in London on her wedding day and faces scrutiny from the monarch's cunning mother.

Title: Platonic
Cast: Stars:, Rose Byrne, , Seth Rogen, , Tre Hale, , Andrew Lopez
Synopsis: Former childhood best friends reconnect as adults and try to get past the rift that led to their falling out.

Title: Grey's Anatomy
Cast: Stars:, Ellen Pompeo, , Chandra Wilson, , James Pickens Jr., , Justin Chambers
Synopsis: A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors.

Title: XO, Kitty
Cast: Stars:, Anna Cathcart, , Minyeong Choi, , Gia Kim, , Sang Heon Lee
Synopsis: A new love story unfolds when teen matchmaker Kitty reunites with her long-distance boyfriend at the same boarding school attended by her late mother.

Title: Fake Profile
Cast: Stars:, Carolina Miranda, , Rodolfo Salas, , Juanse Díez, , Manuela González
Synopsis: Camila creates a sexy profile on the online dating app Spice looking for the man of her dreams. But her dreams quickly turn into nightmares, and Camila ends up falling into a web of sex, lies, and deception.

Title: The Little Mermaid
Cast: Directors:, Ron Clements, , John Musker, | ,     Stars:, Jodi Benson, , Samuel E. Wright, , Rene Auberjonois, , Christopher Daniel Barnes
Synopsis: A mermaid princess makes a Faustian bargain in an attempt to become human and win a prince's love.

Title: Bridgerton
Cast: Stars:, Nicola Coughlan, , Julie Andrews, , Luke Newton, , Luke Thompson
Synopsis: Wealth, lust and betrayal set against the backdrop of Regency-era England, seen through the eyes of the powerful Bridgerton family.

Title: Modern Family
Cast: Stars:, Ed O'Neill, , Sofía Vergara, , Julie Bowen, , Ty Burrell
Synopsis: Three different but related families face trials and tribulations in their own uniquely comedic ways.

Title: The Big Bang Theory
Cast: Stars:, Johnny Galecki, , Jim Parsons, , Kaley Cuoco, , Simon Helberg
Synopsis: A woman who moves into an apartment across the hall from two brilliant but socially awkward physicists shows them how little they know about life outside of the laboratory.

Title: Friends
Cast: Stars:, Jennifer Aniston, , Courteney Cox, , Lisa Kudrow, , Matt LeBlanc
Synopsis: Follows the personal and professional lives of six twenty to thirty year-old friends living in the Manhattan borough of New York City.

Title: Outlander
Cast: Stars:, Caitríona Balfe, , Sam Heughan, , Sophie Skelton, , Richard Rankin
Synopsis: Claire Beauchamp Randall, a nurse in World War II, mysteriously goes back in time to Scotland in 1743. There, she meets a dashing Highland warrior and gets drawn into an epic rebellion.

Title: Bones
Cast: Stars:, Emily Deschanel, , David Boreanaz, , Michaela Conlin, , T.J. Thyne
Synopsis: Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones.

Title: Firefly Lane
Cast: Stars:, Katherine Heigl, , Sarah Chalke, , Ben Lawson, , Ali Skovbye
Synopsis: Tully and Kate support each other through good times and bad with an unbreakable bond that carries them from their teens to their forties.

Title: House of the Dragon
Cast: Stars:, Matt Smith, , Graham McTavish, , Steve Toussaint, , Eve Best
Synopsis: An internal succession war within House Targaryen at the height of its power, 172 years before the birth of Daenerys Targaryen.

Title: Ghosted
Cast: Director:, Dexter Fletcher, | ,     Stars:, Chris Evans, , Ana de Armas, , Adrien Brody, , Mike Moh
Synopsis: Cole falls head over heels for enigmatic Sadie, but then makes the shocking discovery that she's a secret agent. Before they can decide on a second date, Cole and Sadie are swept away on an international adventure to save the world.

Title: Vikings
Cast: Stars:, Katheryn Winnick, , Gustaf Skarsgård, , Alexander Ludwig, , Georgia Hirst
Synopsis: Vikings transports us to the brutal and mysterious world of Ragnar Lothbrok, a Viking warrior and farmer who yearns to explore--and raid--the distant shores across the ocean.

Title: A Beautiful Life
Cast: Director:, Mehdi Avaz, | ,     Stars:, Christopher, , Inga Ibsdotter Lilleaas, , Christine Albeck Børge, , Ardalan Esmaili
Synopsis: Elliott, a young fisherman with an extraordinary voice, gets the chance of a lifetime when high-profile music manager Suzanne discovers him at a party.

Cast: Stars:, Sarah Jessica Parker, , Kim Cattrall, , Kristin Davis, , Cynthia Nixon
Synopsis: Four female New Yorkers gossip about their sex lives (or lack thereof) and find new ways to deal with being a woman in the late 1990s.

Cast: Director:, George Miller, | ,     Stars:, Tilda Swinton, , Idris Elba, , Erdil Yasaroglu, , Sarah Houbolt
Synopsis: A lonely scholar, on a trip to Istanbul, discovers a Djinn who offers her three wishes in exchange for his freedom.

Title: Peter Pan & Wendy
Cast: Director:, David Lowery, | ,     Stars:, Alexander Molony, , Ever Anderson, , Jude Law, , Alyssa Wapanatâhk
Synopsis: Follow the adventures of Peter Pan, a boy who does not want to grow up, and how he recruits three siblings in London, and together they embark on a magical adventure on the enchanted island of Neverland.

Title: You
Cast: Stars:, Penn Badgley, , Victoria Pedretti, , Tati Gabrielle, , Ambyr Childers
Synopsis: A dangerously charming, intensely obsessive young man goes to extreme measures to insert himself into the lives of those he is transfixed by.

Title: Superman & Lois
Cast: Stars:, Tyler Hoechlin, , Elizabeth Tulloch, , Alex Garfin, , Erik Valdez
Synopsis: The world's most famous superhero and comic books' most famous journalist face the pressures and complexities that come with balancing work, justice, and parenthood in today's society.

Title: Love Again
Cast: Director:, Jim Strouse, | ,     Stars:, Priyanka Chopra Jonas, , Sam Heughan, , Céline Dion, , Sofia Barclay
Synopsis: A young woman tries to ease the pain of her fiancé's death by sending romantic texts to his old cell phone number, and forms a connection with the man the number has been reassigned to.

Cast: Stars:, Josh Radnor, , Jason Segel, , Cobie Smulders, , Neil Patrick Harris
Synopsis: A father recounts to his children - through a series of flashbacks - the journey he and his four best friends took leading up to him meeting their mother.

Title: Castle
Cast: Stars:, Nathan Fillion, , Stana Katic, , Susan Sullivan, , Jon Huertas
Synopsis: After a serial killer imitates the plots of his novels, successful mystery novelist Richard "Rick" Castle receives permission from the Mayor of New York City to tag along with an NYPD homicide investigation team for research purposes.

Cast: Stars:, Topher Grace, , Laura Prepon, , Mila Kunis, , Danny Masterson
Synopsis: A comedy revolving around a group of teenage friends, their mishaps, and their coming of age, set in 1970s Wisconsin.

Title: The Vampire Diaries
Cast: Stars:, Nina Dobrev, , Paul Wesley, , Ian Somerhalder, , Kat Graham
Synopsis: The lives, loves, dangers and disasters in the town, Mystic Falls, Virginia. Creatures of unspeakable horror lurk beneath this town as a teenage girl is suddenly torn between two vampire brothers.

Synopsis: Claire Beauchamp Randall, a nurse in World War II, mysteriously goes back in time to Scotland in 1743. There, she meets a dashing Highland warrior and gets drawn into an epic rebellion.

Title: Bones
Cast: Stars:, Emily Deschanel, , David Boreanaz, , Michaela Conlin, , T.J. Thyne
Synopsis: Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones.

Title: Firefly Lane
Cast: Stars:, Katherine Heigl, , Sarah Chalke, , Ben Lawson, , Ali Skovbye
Synopsis: Tully and Kate support each other through good times and bad with an unbreakable bond that carries them from their teens to their forties.

Title: House of the Dragon
Cast: Stars:, Matt Smith, , Graham McTavish, , Steve Toussaint, , Eve Best
Synopsis: An internal succession war within House Targaryen at the height of its power, 172 years before the birth of Daenerys Targaryen.

Title: Ghosted
Cast: Director:, Dexter Fletcher, | ,     Stars:, Chris Evans, , Ana de Armas, , Adrien Brody, , Mike Moh
Synopsis: Cole falls head over heels for enigmatic Sadie, but then makes the shocking discovery that she's a secret agent. Before they can decide on a second date, Cole and Sadie are swept away on an international adventure to save the world.

Title: Vikings
Cast: Stars:, Katheryn Winnick, , Gustaf Skarsgård, , Alexander Ludwig, , Georgia Hirst
Synopsis: Vikings transports us to the brutal and mysterious world of Ragnar Lothbrok, a Viking warrior and farmer who yearns to explore--and raid--the distant shores across the ocean.

Title: A Beautiful Life
Cast: Director:, Mehdi Avaz, | ,     Stars:, Christopher, , Inga Ibsdotter Lilleaas, , Christine Albeck Børge, , Ardalan Esmaili
Synopsis: Elliott, a young fisherman with an extraordinary voice, gets the chance of a lifetime when high-profile music manager Suzanne discovers him at a party.

Title: Sex and the City
Cast: Stars:, Sarah Jessica Parker, , Kim Cattrall, , Kristin Davis, , Cynthia Nixon
Synopsis: Four female New Yorkers gossip about their sex lives (or lack thereof) and find new ways to deal with being a woman in the late 1990s.

Title: Three Thousand Years of Longing
Cast: Director:, George Miller, | ,     Stars:, Tilda Swinton, , Idris Elba, , Erdil Yasaroglu, , Sarah Houbolt
Synopsis: A lonely scholar, on a trip to Istanbul, discovers a Djinn who offers her three wishes in exchange for his freedom.

Title: Peter Pan & Wendy
Cast: Director:, David Lowery, | ,     Stars:, Alexander Molony, , Ever Anderson, , Jude Law, , Alyssa Wapanatâhk
Synopsis: Follow the adventures of Peter Pan, a boy who does not want to grow up, and how he recruits three siblings in London, and together they embark on a magical adventure on the enchanted island of Neverland.

Title: You
Cast: Stars:, Penn Badgley, , Victoria Pedretti, , Tati Gabrielle, , Ambyr Childers
Synopsis: A dangerously charming, intensely obsessive young man goes to extreme measures to insert himself into the lives of those he is transfixed by.

Title: Superman & Lois
Cast: Stars:, Tyler Hoechlin, , Elizabeth Tulloch, , Alex Garfin, , Erik Valdez
Synopsis: The world's most famous superhero and comic books' most famous journalist face the pressures and complexities that come with balancing work, justice, and parenthood in today's society.

Title: Love Again
Cast: Director:, Jim Strouse, | ,     Stars:, Priyanka Chopra Jonas, , Sam Heughan, , Céline Dion, , Sofia Barclay
Synopsis: A young woman tries to ease the pain of her fiancé's death by sending romantic texts to his old cell phone number, and forms a connection with the man the number has been reassigned to.

Title: How I Met Your Mother
Cast: Stars:, Josh Radnor, , Jason Segel, , Cobie Smulders, , Neil Patrick Harris
Synopsis: A father recounts to his children - through a series of flashbacks - the journey he and his four best friends took leading up to him meeting their mother.

Title: Castle
Cast: Stars:, Nathan Fillion, , Stana Katic, , Susan Sullivan, , Jon Huertas
Synopsis: After a serial killer imitates the plots of his novels, successful mystery novelist Richard "Rick" Castle receives permission from the Mayor of New York City to tag along with an NYPD homicide investigation team for research purposes.

Title: That '70s Show
Cast: Stars:, Topher Grace, , Laura Prepon, , Mila Kunis, , Danny Masterson
Synopsis: A comedy revolving around a group of teenage friends, their mishaps, and their coming of age, set in 1970s Wisconsin.

Title: The Vampire Diaries
Cast: Stars:, Nina Dobrev, , Paul Wesley, , Ian Somerhalder, , Kat Graham
Synopsis: The lives, loves, dangers and disasters in the town, Mystic Falls, Virginia. Creatures of unspeakable horror lurk beneath this town as a teenage girl is suddenly torn between two vampire brothers.

Title: And Just Like That...
Cast: Stars:, Sarah Jessica Parker, , Cynthia Nixon, , Kristin Davis, , Sara Ramirez
Synopsis: The series follows Carrie, Miranda, and Charlotte as they navigate the journey from the complicated reality of life and friendship in their 30s to the even more complicated reality of life and friendship in their 50s.

Title: Daisy Jones & The Six
Cast: Stars:, Riley Keough, , Sam Claflin, , Camila Morrone, , Suki Waterhouse
Synopsis: Following the rise of rock band Daisy Jones and The Six through the 1970s Los Angeles music scene on their quest for worldwide icon status.

Title: Titanic
Cast: Director:, James Cameron, | ,     Stars:, Leonardo DiCaprio, , Kate Winslet, , Billy Zane, , Kathy Bates
Synopsis: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

Title: The Summer I Turned Pretty
Cast: Stars:, Lola Tung, , Jackie Chung, , Rachel Blanchard, , Christopher Briney
Synopsis: A love triangle between one girl and two brothers. A story about first love, first heartbreak, and the magic of that one perfect summer.

Title: Two and a Half Men
Cast: Stars:, Jon Cryer, , Ashton Kutcher, , Angus T. Jones, , Conchata Ferrell
Synopsis: A hedonistic jingle writer's free-wheeling life comes to an abrupt halt when his brother and 10-year-old nephew move into his beach-front house.

Title: New Girl
Cast: Stars:, Zooey Deschanel, , Jake Johnson, , Max Greenfield, , Hannah Simone
Synopsis: After a bad break-up, Jess, an offbeat young woman, moves into an apartment loft with three single men. Although they find her behavior very unusual, the men support her - most of the time.

Title: Buffy the Vampire Slayer
Cast: Stars:, Sarah Michelle Gellar, , Nicholas Brendon, , Alyson Hannigan, , Anthony Head
Synopsis: A young woman, destined to slay vampires, demons and other infernal creatures, deals with her life fighting evil, with the help of her friends.

Title: Riverdale
Cast: Stars:, Lili Reinhart, , Camila Mendes, , Cole Sprouse, , K.J. Apa
Synopsis: While navigating the troubled waters of romance, school and family, Archie and his gang become entangled in dark Riverdale mysteries.

Title: Thor: Love and Thunder
Cast: Director:, Taika Waititi, | ,     Stars:, Chris Hemsworth, , Natalie Portman, , Christian Bale, , Tessa Thompson
Synopsis: Thor enlists the help of Valkyrie, Korg and ex-girlfriend Jane Foster to fight Gorr the God Butcher, who intends to make the gods extinct.

Title: Where the Crawdads Sing
Cast: Director:, Olivia Newman, | ,     Stars:, Daisy Edgar-Jones, , Taylor John Smith, , Harris Dickinson, , David Strathairn
Synopsis: A woman who raised herself in the marshes of the Deep South becomes a suspect in the murder of a man with whom she was once involved.

Synopsis: A spinoff of the original John Travolta and Olivia Newton John 1978 musical.

Synopsis: The lives, loves and losses of the doctors and nurses of Chicago's County General Hospital.

Synopsis: Beca, a freshman at Barden University, is cajoled into joining The Bellas, her school's all-girls singing group. Injecting some much needed energy into their repertoire, The Bellas take on their male rivals in a campus competition.

Synopsis: A father recounts to his children - through a series of flashbacks - the journey he and his four best friends took leading up to him meeting their mother.

Synopsis: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

Title: The Little Mermaid
Cast: Director:, Rob Marshall, | ,     Stars:, Halle Bailey, , Jonah Hauer-King, , Melissa McCarthy, , Javier Bardem
Synopsis: A young mermaid makes a deal with a sea witch to trade her beautiful voice for human legs so she can discover the world above water and impress a prince.

Title: Asteroid City
Cast: Director:, Wes Anderson, | ,     Stars:, Jason Schwartzman, , Scarlett Johansson, , Tom Hanks, , Jeffrey Wright
Synopsis: The itinerary of a Junior Stargazer convention is spectacularly disrupted by world-changing events.

Title: Queen Charlotte: A Bridgerton Story
Cast: Stars:, India Amarteifio, , Adjoa Andoh, , Michelle Fairley, , Ruth Gemmell
Synopsis: Betrothed against her will to King George, young Charlotte arrives in London on her wedding day and faces scrutiny from the monarch's cunning mother.

Title: Platonic
Cast: Stars:, Rose Byrne, , Seth Rogen, , Tre Hale, , Andrew Lopez
Synopsis: Former childhood best friends reconnect as adults and try to get past the rift that led to their falling out.

Title: Grey's Anatomy
Cast: Stars:, Ellen Pompeo, , Chandra Wilson, , James Pickens Jr., , Justin Chambers
Synopsis: A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors.

Title: XO, Kitty
Cast: Stars:, Anna Cathcart, , Minyeong Choi, , Gia Kim, , Sang Heon Lee
Synopsis: A new love story unfolds when teen matchmaker Kitty reunites with her long-distance boyfriend at the same boarding school attended by her late mother.

Title: Fake Profile
Cast: Stars:, Carolina Miranda, , Rodolfo Salas, , Juanse Díez, , Manuela González
Synopsis: Camila creates a sexy profile on the online dating app Spice looking for the man of her dreams. But her dreams quickly turn into nightmares, and Camila ends up falling into a web of sex, lies, and deception.

Title: The Little Mermaid
Cast: Directors:, Ron Clements, , John Musker, | ,     Stars:, Jodi Benson, , Samuel E. Wright, , Rene Auberjonois, , Christopher Daniel Barnes
Synopsis: A mermaid princess makes a Faustian bargain in an attempt to become human and win a prince's love.

Title: Bridgerton
Cast: Stars:, Nicola Coughlan, , Julie Andrews, , Luke Newton, , Luke Thompson
Synopsis: Wealth, lust and betrayal set against the backdrop of Regency-era England, seen through the eyes of the powerful Bridgerton family.

Title: Modern Family
Cast: Stars:, Ed O'Neill, , Sofía Vergara, , Julie Bowen, , Ty Burrell
Synopsis: Three different but related families face trials and tribulations in their own uniquely comedic ways.

Title: The Big Bang Theory
Cast: Stars:, Johnny Galecki, , Jim Parsons, , Kaley Cuoco, , Simon Helberg
Synopsis: A woman who moves into an apartment across the hall from two brilliant but socially awkward physicists shows them how little they know about life outside of the laboratory.

Title: Friends
Cast: Stars:, Jennifer Aniston, , Courteney Cox, , Lisa Kudrow, , Matt LeBlanc
Synopsis: Follows the personal and professional lives of six twenty to thirty year-old friends living in the Manhattan borough of New York City.

Title: Outlander
Cast: Stars:, Caitríona Balfe, , Sam Heughan, , Sophie Skelton, , Richard Rankin
Synopsis: Claire Beauchamp Randall, a nurse in World War II, mysteriously goes back in time to Scotland in 1743. There, she meets a dashing Highland warrior and gets drawn into an epic rebellion.

Title: Bones
Cast: Stars:, Emily Deschanel, , David Boreanaz, , Michaela Conlin, , T.J. Thyne
Synopsis: Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones.

Title: Firefly Lane
Cast: Stars:, Katherine Heigl, , Sarah Chalke, , Ben Lawson, , Ali Skovbye
Synopsis: Tully and Kate support each other through good times and bad with an unbreakable bond that carries them from their teens to their forties.

Title: House of the Dragon
Cast: Stars:, Matt Smith, , Graham McTavish, , Steve Toussaint, , Eve Best
Synopsis: An internal succession war within House Targaryen at the height of its power, 172 years before the birth of Daenerys Targaryen.

Title: Ghosted
Cast: Director:, Dexter Fletcher, | ,     Stars:, Chris Evans, , Ana de Armas, , Adrien Brody, , Mike Moh
Synopsis: Cole falls head over heels for enigmatic Sadie, but then makes the shocking discovery that she's a secret agent. Before they can decide on a second date, Cole and Sadie are swept away on an international adventure to save the world.

Title: Vikings
Cast: Stars:, Katheryn Winnick, , Gustaf Skarsgård, , Alexander Ludwig, , Georgia Hirst
Synopsis: Vikings transports us to the brutal and mysterious world of Ragnar Lothbrok, a Viking warrior and farmer who yearns to explore--and raid--the distant shores across the ocean.

Title: A Beautiful Life
Cast: Director:, Mehdi Avaz, | ,     Stars:, Christopher, , Inga Ibsdotter Lilleaas, , Christine Albeck Børge, , Ardalan Esmaili
Synopsis: Elliott, a young fisherman with an extraordinary voice, gets the chance of a lifetime when high-profile music manager Suzanne discovers him at a party.

Title: Sex and the City
Cast: Stars:, Sarah Jessica Parker, , Kim Cattrall, , Kristin Davis, , Cynthia Nixon
Synopsis: Four female New Yorkers gossip about their sex lives (or lack thereof) and find new ways to deal with being a woman in the late 1990s.

Title: Three Thousand Years of Longing
Cast: Director:, George Miller, | ,     Stars:, Tilda Swinton, , Idris Elba, , Erdil Yasaroglu, , Sarah Houbolt
Synopsis: A lonely scholar, on a trip to Istanbul, discovers a Djinn who offers her three wishes in exchange for his freedom.

Title: Peter Pan & Wendy
Cast: Director:, David Lowery, | ,     Stars:, Alexander Molony, , Ever Anderson, , Jude Law, , Alyssa Wapanatâhk
Synopsis: Follow the adventures of Peter Pan, a boy who does not want to grow up, and how he recruits three siblings in London, and together they embark on a magical adventure on the enchanted island of Neverland.

Title: You
Cast: Stars:, Penn Badgley, , Victoria Pedretti, , Tati Gabrielle, , Ambyr Childers
Synopsis: A dangerously charming, intensely obsessive young man goes to extreme measures to insert himself into the lives of those he is transfixed by.

Title: Superman & Lois
Cast: Stars:, Tyler Hoechlin, , Elizabeth Tulloch, , Alex Garfin, , Erik Valdez
Synopsis: The world's most famous superhero and comic books' most famous journalist face the pressures and complexities that come with balancing work, justice, and parenthood in today's society.

Title: Love Again
Cast: Director:, Jim Strouse, | ,     Stars:, Priyanka Chopra Jonas, , Sam Heughan, , Céline Dion, , Sofia Barclay
Synopsis: A young woman tries to ease the pain of her fiancé's death by sending romantic texts to his old cell phone number, and forms a connection with the man the number has been reassigned to.

Title: How I Met Your Mother
Cast: Stars:, Josh Radnor, , Jason Segel, , Cobie Smulders, , Neil Patrick Harris
Synopsis: A father recounts to his children - through a series of flashbacks - the journey he and his four best friends took leading up to him meeting their mother.

Title: Castle
Cast: Stars:, Nathan Fillion, , Stana Katic, , Susan Sullivan, , Jon Huertas
Synopsis: After a serial killer imitates the plots of his novels, successful mystery novelist Richard "Rick" Castle receives permission from the Mayor of New York City to tag along with an NYPD homicide investigation team for research purposes.

Title: That '70s Show
Cast: Stars:, Topher Grace, , Laura Prepon, , Mila Kunis, , Danny Masterson
Synopsis: A comedy revolving around a group of teenage friends, their mishaps, and their coming of age, set in 1970s Wisconsin.

Title: The Vampire Diaries
Cast: Stars:, Nina Dobrev, , Paul Wesley, , Ian Somerhalder, , Kat Graham
Synopsis: The lives, loves, dangers and disasters in the town, Mystic Falls, Virginia. Creatures of unspeakable horror lurk beneath this town as a teenage girl is suddenly torn between two vampire brothers.

Title: And Just Like That...
Cast: Stars:, Sarah Jessica Parker, , Cynthia Nixon, , Kristin Davis, , Sara Ramirez
Synopsis: The series follows Carrie, Miranda, and Charlotte as they navigate the journey from the complicated reality of life and friendship in their 30s to the even more complicated reality of life and friendship in their 50s.

Title: Daisy Jones & The Six
Cast: Stars:, Riley Keough, , Sam Claflin, , Camila Morrone, , Suki Waterhouse
Synopsis: Following the rise of rock band Daisy Jones and The Six through the 1970s Los Angeles music scene on their quest for worldwide icon status.

Cast: Stars:, Lola Tung, , Jackie Chung, , Rachel Blanchard, , Christopher Briney
Synopsis: A love triangle between one girl and two brothers. A story about first love, first heartbreak, and the magic of that one perfect summer.

Title: Two and a Half Men
Cast: Stars:, Jon Cryer, , Ashton Kutcher, , Angus T. Jones, , Conchata Ferrell
Synopsis: A hedonistic jingle writer's free-wheeling life comes to an abrupt halt when his brother and 10-year-old nephew move into his beach-front house.

Cast: Stars:, Sarah Michelle Gellar, , Nicholas Brendon, , Alyson Hannigan, , Anthony Head

Synopsis: Wealth, lust and betrayal set against the backdrop of Regency-era England, seen through the eyes of the powerful Bridgerton family.

Title: Modern Family
Cast: Stars:, Ed O'Neill, , Sofía Vergara, , Julie Bowen, , Ty Burrell
Synopsis: Three different but related families face trials and tribulations in their own uniquely comedic ways.

Title: The Big Bang Theory
Cast: Stars:, Johnny Galecki, , Jim Parsons, , Kaley Cuoco, , Simon Helberg
Synopsis: A woman who moves into an apartment across the hall from two brilliant but socially awkward physicists shows them how little they know about life outside of the laboratory.

Title: Friends
Cast: Stars:, Jennifer Aniston, , Courteney Cox, , Lisa Kudrow, , Matt LeBlanc
Synopsis: Follows the personal and professional lives of six twenty to thirty year-old friends living in the Manhattan borough of New York City.

Title: Outlander
Cast: Stars:, Caitríona Balfe, , Sam Heughan, , Sophie Skelton, , Richard Rankin
Synopsis: Claire Beauchamp Randall, a nurse in World War II, mysteriously goes back in time to Scotland in 1743. There, she meets a dashing Highland warrior and gets drawn into an epic rebellion.

Title: Bones
Cast: Stars:, Emily Deschanel, , David Boreanaz, , Michaela Conlin, , T.J. Thyne
Synopsis: Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones.

Title: Firefly Lane
Cast: Stars:, Katherine Heigl, , Sarah Chalke, , Ben Lawson, , Ali Skovbye
Synopsis: Tully and Kate support each other through good times and bad with an unbreakable bond that carries them from their teens to their forties.

Title: House of the Dragon
Cast: Stars:, Matt Smith, , Graham McTavish, , Steve Toussaint, , Eve Best
Synopsis: An internal succession war within House Targaryen at the height of its power, 172 years before the birth of Daenerys Targaryen.

Title: Ghosted
Cast: Director:, Dexter Fletcher, | ,     Stars:, Chris Evans, , Ana de Armas, , Adrien Brody, , Mike Moh
Synopsis: Cole falls head over heels for enigmatic Sadie, but then makes the shocking discovery that she's a secret agent. Before they can decide on a second date, Cole and Sadie are swept away on an international adventure to save the world.

Title: Vikings
Cast: Stars:, Katheryn Winnick, , Gustaf Skarsgård, , Alexander Ludwig, , Georgia Hirst
Synopsis: Vikings transports us to the brutal and mysterious world of Ragnar Lothbrok, a Viking warrior and farmer who yearns to explore--and raid--the distant shores across the ocean.

Title: A Beautiful Life
Cast: Director:, Mehdi Avaz, | ,     Stars:, Christopher, , Inga Ibsdotter Lilleaas, , Christine Albeck Børge, , Ardalan Esmaili
Synopsis: Elliott, a young fisherman with an extraordinary voice, gets the chance of a lifetime when high-profile music manager Suzanne discovers him at a party.

Title: Sex and the City
Cast: Stars:, Sarah Jessica Parker, , Kim Cattrall, , Kristin Davis, , Cynthia Nixon
Synopsis: Four female New Yorkers gossip about their sex lives (or lack thereof) and find new ways to deal with being a woman in the late 1990s.

Title: Three Thousand Years of Longing
Cast: Director:, George Miller, | ,     Stars:, Tilda Swinton, , Idris Elba, , Erdil Yasaroglu, , Sarah Houbolt
Synopsis: A lonely scholar, on a trip to Istanbul, discovers a Djinn who offers her three wishes in exchange for his freedom.

Title: Peter Pan & Wendy
Cast: Director:, David Lowery, | ,     Stars:, Alexander Molony, , Ever Anderson, , Jude Law, , Alyssa Wapanatâhk
Synopsis: Follow the adventures of Peter Pan, a boy who does not want to grow up, and how he recruits three siblings in London, and together they embark on a magical adventure on the enchanted island of Neverland.

Title: You
Cast: Stars:, Penn Badgley, , Victoria Pedretti, , Tati Gabrielle, , Ambyr Childers
Synopsis: A dangerously charming, intensely obsessive young man goes to extreme measures to insert himself into the lives of those he is transfixed by.

Title: Superman & Lois
Cast: Stars:, Tyler Hoechlin, , Elizabeth Tulloch, , Alex Garfin, , Erik Valdez
Synopsis: The world's most famous superhero and comic books' most famous journalist face the pressures and complexities that come with balancing work, justice, and parenthood in today's society.

Title: Love Again
Cast: Director:, Jim Strouse, | ,     Stars:, Priyanka Chopra Jonas, , Sam Heughan, , Céline Dion, , Sofia Barclay
Synopsis: A young woman tries to ease the pain of her fiancé's death by sending romantic texts to his old cell phone number, and forms a connection with the man the number has been reassigned to.

Title: How I Met Your Mother
Cast: Stars:, Josh Radnor, , Jason Segel, , Cobie Smulders, , Neil Patrick Harris
Synopsis: A father recounts to his children - through a series of flashbacks - the journey he and his four best friends took leading up to him meeting their mother.

Title: Castle
Cast: Stars:, Nathan Fillion, , Stana Katic, , Susan Sullivan, , Jon Huertas
Synopsis: After a serial killer imitates the plots of his novels, successful mystery novelist Richard "Rick" Castle receives permission from the Mayor of New York City to tag along with an NYPD homicide investigation team for research purposes.

Title: That '70s Show
Cast: Stars:, Topher Grace, , Laura Prepon, , Mila Kunis, , Danny Masterson
Synopsis: A comedy revolving around a group of teenage friends, their mishaps, and their coming of age, set in 1970s Wisconsin.

Title: The Vampire Diaries
Cast: Stars:, Nina Dobrev, , Paul Wesley, , Ian Somerhalder, , Kat Graham
Synopsis: The lives, loves, dangers and disasters in the town, Mystic Falls, Virginia. Creatures of unspeakable horror lurk beneath this town as a teenage girl is suddenly torn between two vampire brothers.

Title: And Just Like That...
Cast: Stars:, Sarah Jessica Parker, , Cynthia Nixon, , Kristin Davis, , Sara Ramirez
Synopsis: The series follows Carrie, Miranda, and Charlotte as they navigate the journey from the complicated reality of life and friendship in their 30s to the even more complicated reality of life and friendship in their 50s.

Title: Daisy Jones & The Six
Cast: Stars:, Riley Keough, , Sam Claflin, , Camila Morrone, , Suki Waterhouse
Synopsis: Following the rise of rock band Daisy Jones and The Six through the 1970s Los Angeles music scene on their quest for worldwide icon status.

Title: Titanic
Cast: Director:, James Cameron, | ,     Stars:, Leonardo DiCaprio, , Kate Winslet, , Billy Zane, , Kathy Bates
Synopsis: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

Title: The Summer I Turned Pretty
Cast: Stars:, Lola Tung, , Jackie Chung, , Rachel Blanchard, , Christopher Briney
Synopsis: A love triangle between one girl and two brothers. A story about first love, first heartbreak, and the magic of that one perfect summer.

Title: Two and a Half Men
Cast: Stars:, Jon Cryer, , Ashton Kutcher, , Angus T. Jones, , Conchata Ferrell
Synopsis: A hedonistic jingle writer's free-wheeling life comes to an abrupt halt when his brother and 10-year-old nephew move into his beach-front house.

Title: New Girl
Cast: Stars:, Zooey Deschanel, , Jake Johnson, , Max Greenfield, , Hannah Simone
Synopsis: After a bad break-up, Jess, an offbeat young woman, moves into an apartment loft with three single men. Although they find her behavior very unusual, the men support her - most of the time.

Title: Buffy the Vampire Slayer
Cast: Stars:, Sarah Michelle Gellar, , Nicholas Brendon, , Alyson Hannigan, , Anthony Head
Synopsis: A young woman, destined to slay vampires, demons and other infernal creatures, deals with her life fighting evil, with the help of her friends.

Title: Riverdale
Cast: Stars:, Lili Reinhart, , Camila Mendes, , Cole Sprouse, , K.J. Apa
Synopsis: While navigating the troubled waters of romance, school and family, Archie and his gang become entangled in dark Riverdale mysteries.

Title: Thor: Love and Thunder
Cast: Director:, Taika Waititi, | ,     Stars:, Chris Hemsworth, , Natalie Portman, , Christian Bale, , Tessa Thompson
Synopsis: Thor enlists the help of Valkyrie, Korg and ex-girlfriend Jane Foster to fight Gorr the God Butcher, who intends to make the gods extinct.

Title: Where the Crawdads Sing
Cast: Director:, Olivia Newman, | ,     Stars:, Daisy Edgar-Jones, , Taylor John Smith, , Harris Dickinson, , David Strathairn
Synopsis: A woman who raised herself in the marshes of the Deep South becomes a suspect in the murder of a man with whom she was once involved.

Title: Grease: Rise of the Pink Ladies
Cast: Stars:, Marisa Davila, , Cheyenne Isabel Wells, , Ari Notartomaso, , Tricia Fukuhara
Synopsis: A spinoff of the original John Travolta and Olivia Newton John 1978 musical.

Title: ER
Cast: Stars:, Anthony Edwards, , George Clooney, , Julianna Margulies, , Eriq La Salle
Synopsis: The lives, loves and losses of the doctors and nurses of Chicago's County General Hospital.

Title: Fifty Shades of Grey
Cast: Director:, Sam Taylor-Johnson, | ,     Stars:, Dakota Johnson, , Jamie Dornan, , Jennifer Ehle, , Eloise Mumford
Synopsis: Literature student Anastasia Steele's life changes forever when she meets handsome, yet tormented, billionaire Christian Grey.

Title: Station 19
Cast: Stars:, Jaina Lee Ortiz, , Jason George, , Grey Damon, , Barrett Doss
Synopsis: This spinoff of the critically acclaimed show Grey's Anatomy follows the lives of the men and women of firehouse station 19 in Seattle, Washington.

Title: Pitch Perfect
Cast: Director:, Jason Moore, | ,     Stars:, Anna Kendrick, , Brittany Snow, , Rebel Wilson, , Anna Camp
Synopsis: Beca, a freshman at Barden University, is cajoled into joining The Bellas, her school's all-girls singing group. Injecting some much needed energy into their repertoire, The Bellas take on their male rivals in a campus competition.

Title: Once Upon a Time
Cast: Stars:, Ginnifer Goodwin, , Jennifer Morrison, , Lana Parrilla, , Robert Carlyle
Synopsis: A young woman with a troubled past is drawn to a small town in Maine where fairy tales are to be believed.

Title: True Blood
Cast: Stars:, Anna Paquin, , Stephen Moyer, , Sam Trammell, , Ryan Kwanten
Synopsis: Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire.

Title: One Tree Hill
Cast: Stars:, Chad Michael Murray, , James Lafferty, , Hilarie Burton, , Bethany Joy Lenz
Synopsis: Half-brothers Lucas and Nathan Scott trade between kinship and rivalry both on the basketball court and in the hearts of their friends in the small, but not so quiet town of Tree Hill, North Carolina.

Title: Outer Banks
Cast: Stars:, Chase Stokes, , Madelyn Cline, , Madison Bailey, , J.D.
Synopsis: On an island of haves and have-nots, teen John B enlists his three best friends to hunt for a legendary treasure linked to his father's disappearance.

Title: Forrest Gump
Cast: Director:, Robert Zemeckis, | ,     Stars:, Tom Hanks, , Robin Wright, , Gary Sinise, , Sally Field
Synopsis: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

Title: The Little Mermaid
Cast: Director:, Rob Marshall, | ,     Stars:, Halle Bailey, , Jonah Hauer-King, , Melissa McCarthy, , Javier Bardem
Synopsis: A young mermaid makes a deal with a sea witch to trade her beautiful voice for human legs so she can discover the world above water and impress a prince.

Synopsis: A lonely scholar, on a trip to Istanbul, discovers a Djinn who offers her three wishes in exchange for his freedom.

Title: Peter Pan & Wendy

Synopsis: The world's most famous superhero and comic books' most famous journalist face the pressures and complexities that come with balancing work, justice, and parenthood in today's society.

Cast: Director:, Jim Strouse, | ,     Stars:, Priyanka Chopra Jonas, , Sam Heughan, , Céline Dion, , Sofia Barclay
Synopsis: A young woman tries to ease the pain of her fiancé's death by sending romantic texts to his old cell phone number, and forms a connection with the man the number has been reassigned to.

Title: How I Met Your Mother
Cast: Stars:, Josh Radnor, , Jason Segel, , Cobie Smulders, , Neil Patrick Harris
Synopsis: A father recounts to his children - through a series of flashbacks - the journey he and his four best friends took leading up to him meeting their mother.

Title: Castle
Cast: Stars:, Nathan Fillion, , Stana Katic, , Susan Sullivan, , Jon Huertas
Synopsis: After a serial killer imitates the plots of his novels, successful mystery novelist Richard "Rick" Castle receives permission from the Mayor of New York City to tag along with an NYPD homicide investigation team for research purposes.

Title: That '70s Show
Cast: Stars:, Topher Grace, , Laura Prepon, , Mila Kunis, , Danny Masterson
Synopsis: A comedy revolving around a group of teenage friends, their mishaps, and their coming of age, set in 1970s Wisconsin.

Title: The Vampire Diaries
Cast: Stars:, Nina Dobrev, , Paul Wesley, , Ian Somerhalder, , Kat Graham
Synopsis: The lives, loves, dangers and disasters in the town, Mystic Falls, Virginia. Creatures of unspeakable horror lurk beneath this town as a teenage girl is suddenly torn between two vampire brothers.

Title: Daisy Jones & The Six
Cast: Stars:, Riley Keough, , Sam Claflin, , Camila Morrone, , Suki Waterhouse

Synopsis: A father recounts to his children - through a series of flashbacks - the journey he and his four best friends took leading up to him meeting their mother.

Title: Castle
Cast: Stars:, Nathan Fillion, , Stana Katic, , Susan Sullivan, , Jon Huertas
Synopsis: After a serial killer imitates the plots of his novels, successful mystery novelist Richard "Rick" Castle receives permission from the Mayor of New York City to tag along with an NYPD homicide investigation team for research purposes.

Title: That '70s Show
Cast: Stars:, Topher Grace, , Laura Prepon, , Mila Kunis, , Danny Masterson
Synopsis: A comedy revolving around a group of teenage friends, their mishaps, and their coming of age, set in 1970s Wisconsin.

Title: The Vampire Diaries
Cast: Stars:, Nina Dobrev, , Paul Wesley, , Ian Somerhalder, , Kat Graham
Synopsis: The lives, loves, dangers and disasters in the town, Mystic Falls, Virginia. Creatures of unspeakable horror lurk beneath this town as a teenage girl is suddenly torn between two vampire brothers.

Title: And Just Like That...
Cast: Stars:, Sarah Jessica Parker, , Cynthia Nixon, , Kristin Davis, , Sara Ramirez
Synopsis: The series follows Carrie, Miranda, and Charlotte as they navigate the journey from the complicated reality of life and friendship in their 30s to the even more complicated reality of life and friendship in their 50s.

Title: Daisy Jones & The Six
Cast: Stars:, Riley Keough, , Sam Claflin, , Camila Morrone, , Suki Waterhouse
Synopsis: Following the rise of rock band Daisy Jones and The Six through the 1970s Los Angeles music scene on their quest for worldwide icon status.

Title: Titanic
Cast: Director:, James Cameron, | ,     Stars:, Leonardo DiCaprio, , Kate Winslet, , Billy Zane, , Kathy Bates
Synopsis: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

Title: The Summer I Turned Pretty
Cast: Stars:, Lola Tung, , Jackie Chung, , Rachel Blanchard, , Christopher Briney
Synopsis: A love triangle between one girl and two brothers. A story about first love, first heartbreak, and the magic of that one perfect summer.

Title: Two and a Half Men
Cast: Stars:, Jon Cryer, , Ashton Kutcher, , Angus T. Jones, , Conchata Ferrell
Synopsis: A hedonistic jingle writer's free-wheeling life comes to an abrupt halt when his brother and 10-year-old nephew move into his beach-front house.

Title: New Girl
Cast: Stars:, Zooey Deschanel, , Jake Johnson, , Max Greenfield, , Hannah Simone
Synopsis: After a bad break-up, Jess, an offbeat young woman, moves into an apartment loft with three single men. Although they find her behavior very unusual, the men support her - most of the time.

Title: Buffy the Vampire Slayer
Cast: Stars:, Sarah Michelle Gellar, , Nicholas Brendon, , Alyson Hannigan, , Anthony Head
Synopsis: A young woman, destined to slay vampires, demons and other infernal creatures, deals with her life fighting evil, with the help of her friends.

Title: Riverdale
Cast: Stars:, Lili Reinhart, , Camila Mendes, , Cole Sprouse, , K.J. Apa
Synopsis: While navigating the troubled waters of romance, school and family, Archie and his gang become entangled in dark Riverdale mysteries.

Title: Thor: Love and Thunder
Cast: Director:, Taika Waititi, | ,     Stars:, Chris Hemsworth, , Natalie Portman, , Christian Bale, , Tessa Thompson
Synopsis: Thor enlists the help of Valkyrie, Korg and ex-girlfriend Jane Foster to fight Gorr the God Butcher, who intends to make the gods extinct.

Title: Where the Crawdads Sing
Cast: Director:, Olivia Newman, | ,     Stars:, Daisy Edgar-Jones, , Taylor John Smith, , Harris Dickinson, , David Strathairn
Synopsis: A woman who raised herself in the marshes of the Deep South becomes a suspect in the murder of a man with whom she was once involved.

Title: Grease: Rise of the Pink Ladies
Cast: Stars:, Marisa Davila, , Cheyenne Isabel Wells, , Ari Notartomaso, , Tricia Fukuhara
Synopsis: A spinoff of the original John Travolta and Olivia Newton John 1978 musical.

Title: ER
Cast: Stars:, Anthony Edwards, , George Clooney, , Julianna Margulies, , Eriq La Salle
Synopsis: The lives, loves and losses of the doctors and nurses of Chicago's County General Hospital.

Title: Fifty Shades of Grey
Cast: Director:, Sam Taylor-Johnson, | ,     Stars:, Dakota Johnson, , Jamie Dornan, , Jennifer Ehle, , Eloise Mumford
Synopsis: Literature student Anastasia Steele's life changes forever when she meets handsome, yet tormented, billionaire Christian Grey.

Title: Station 19
Cast: Stars:, Jaina Lee Ortiz, , Jason George, , Grey Damon, , Barrett Doss
Synopsis: This spinoff of the critically acclaimed show Grey's Anatomy follows the lives of the men and women of firehouse station 19 in Seattle, Washington.

Title: Pitch Perfect
Cast: Director:, Jason Moore, | ,     Stars:, Anna Kendrick, , Brittany Snow, , Rebel Wilson, , Anna Camp
Synopsis: Beca, a freshman at Barden University, is cajoled into joining The Bellas, her school's all-girls singing group. Injecting some much needed energy into their repertoire, The Bellas take on their male rivals in a campus competition.

Title: Once Upon a Time
Cast: Stars:, Ginnifer Goodwin, , Jennifer Morrison, , Lana Parrilla, , Robert Carlyle
Synopsis: A young woman with a troubled past is drawn to a small town in Maine where fairy tales are to be believed.

Title: True Blood
Cast: Stars:, Anna Paquin, , Stephen Moyer, , Sam Trammell, , Ryan Kwanten
Synopsis: Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire.

Title: One Tree Hill
Cast: Stars:, Chad Michael Murray, , James Lafferty, , Hilarie Burton, , Bethany Joy Lenz
Synopsis: Half-brothers Lucas and Nathan Scott trade between kinship and rivalry both on the basketball court and in the hearts of their friends in the small, but not so quiet town of Tree Hill, North Carolina.

Title: Outer Banks
Cast: Stars:, Chase Stokes, , Madelyn Cline, , Madison Bailey, , J.D.
Synopsis: On an island of haves and have-nots, teen John B enlists his three best friends to hunt for a legendary treasure linked to his father's disappearance.

Title: Forrest Gump
Cast: Director:, Robert Zemeckis, | ,     Stars:, Tom Hanks, , Robin Wright, , Gary Sinise, , Sally Field
Synopsis: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

Title: The Little Mermaid
Cast: Director:, Rob Marshall, | ,     Stars:, Halle Bailey, , Jonah Hauer-King, , Melissa McCarthy, , Javier Bardem
Synopsis: A young mermaid makes a deal with a sea witch to trade her beautiful voice for human legs so she can discover the world above water and impress a prince.

Title: Asteroid City
Cast: Director:, Wes Anderson, | ,     Stars:, Jason Schwartzman, , Scarlett Johansson, , Tom Hanks, , Jeffrey Wright
Synopsis: The itinerary of a Junior Stargazer convention is spectacularly disrupted by world-changing events.

Title: Queen Charlotte: A Bridgerton Story
Cast: Stars:, India Amarteifio, , Adjoa Andoh, , Michelle Fairley, , Ruth Gemmell
Synopsis: Betrothed against her will to King George, young Charlotte arrives in London on her wedding day and faces scrutiny from the monarch's cunning mother.

Title: Platonic
Cast: Stars:, Rose Byrne, , Seth Rogen, , Tre Hale, , Andrew Lopez
Synopsis: Former childhood best friends reconnect as adults and try to get past the rift that led to their falling out.

Title: Grey's Anatomy
Cast: Stars:, Ellen Pompeo, , Chandra Wilson, , James Pickens Jr., , Justin Chambers
Synopsis: A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors.

Title: XO, Kitty
Cast: Stars:, Anna Cathcart, , Minyeong Choi, , Gia Kim, , Sang Heon Lee
Synopsis: A new love story unfolds when teen matchmaker Kitty reunites with her long-distance boyfriend at the same boarding school attended by her late mother.

Title: Fake Profile
Cast: Stars:, Carolina Miranda, , Rodolfo Salas, , Juanse Díez, , Manuela González
Synopsis: Camila creates a sexy profile on the online dating app Spice looking for the man of her dreams. But her dreams quickly turn into nightmares, and Camila ends up falling into a web of sex, lies, and deception.

Title: The Little Mermaid
Cast: Directors:, Ron Clements, , John Musker, | ,     Stars:, Jodi Benson, , Samuel E. Wright, , Rene Auberjonois, , Christopher Daniel Barnes
Synopsis: A mermaid princess makes a Faustian bargain in an attempt to become human and win a prince's love.

Title: Bridgerton
Cast: Stars:, Nicola Coughlan, , Julie Andrews, , Luke Newton, , Luke Thompson
Synopsis: Wealth, lust and betrayal set against the backdrop of Regency-era England, seen through the eyes of the powerful Bridgerton family.

Title: Modern Family
Cast: Stars:, Ed O'Neill, , Sofía Vergara, , Julie Bowen, , Ty Burrell
Synopsis: Three different but related families face trials and tribulations in their own uniquely comedic ways.

Title: The Big Bang Theory
Cast: Stars:, Johnny Galecki, , Jim Parsons, , Kaley Cuoco, , Simon Helberg
Synopsis: A woman who moves into an apartment across the hall from two brilliant but socially awkward physicists shows them how little they know about life outside of the laboratory.

Title: Friends
Cast: Stars:, Jennifer Aniston, , Courteney Cox, , Lisa Kudrow, , Matt LeBlanc
Synopsis: Follows the personal and professional lives of six twenty to thirty year-old friends living in the Manhattan borough of New York City.

Title: Outlander
Cast: Stars:, Caitríona Balfe, , Sam Heughan, , Sophie Skelton, , Richard Rankin
Synopsis: Claire Beauchamp Randall, a nurse in World War II, mysteriously goes back in time to Scotland in 1743. There, she meets a dashing Highland warrior and gets drawn into an epic rebellion.

Title: Bones
Cast: Stars:, Emily Deschanel, , David Boreanaz, , Michaela Conlin, , T.J. Thyne
Synopsis: Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones.

Title: Firefly Lane
Cast: Stars:, Katherine Heigl, , Sarah Chalke, , Ben Lawson, , Ali Skovbye
Synopsis: Tully and Kate support each other through good times and bad with an unbreakable bond that carries them from their teens to their forties.

Title: House of the Dragon
Cast: Stars:, Matt Smith, , Graham McTavish, , Steve Toussaint, , Eve Best
Synopsis: An internal succession war within House Targaryen at the height of its power, 172 years before the birth of Daenerys Targaryen.

Title: Ghosted
Cast: Director:, Dexter Fletcher, | ,     Stars:, Chris Evans, , Ana de Armas, , Adrien Brody, , Mike Moh
Synopsis: Cole falls head over heels for enigmatic Sadie, but then makes the shocking discovery that she's a secret agent. Before they can decide on a second date, Cole and Sadie are swept away on an international adventure to save the world.

Title: Vikings
Cast: Stars:, Katheryn Winnick, , Gustaf Skarsgård, , Alexander Ludwig, , Georgia Hirst
Synopsis: Vikings transports us to the brutal and mysterious world of Ragnar Lothbrok, a Viking warrior and farmer who yearns to explore--and raid--the distant shores across the ocean.

Title: A Beautiful Life
Cast: Director:, Mehdi Avaz, | ,     Stars:, Christopher, , Inga Ibsdotter Lilleaas, , Christine Albeck Børge, , Ardalan Esmaili
Synopsis: Elliott, a young fisherman with an extraordinary voice, gets the chance of a lifetime when high-profile music manager Suzanne discovers him at a party.

Title: Sex and the City
Cast: Stars:, Sarah Jessica Parker, , Kim Cattrall, , Kristin Davis, , Cynthia Nixon
Synopsis: Four female New Yorkers gossip about their sex lives (or lack thereof) and find new ways to deal with being a woman in the late 1990s.

Title: Three Thousand Years of Longing
Cast: Director:, George Miller, | ,     Stars:, Tilda Swinton, , Idris Elba, , Erdil Yasaroglu, , Sarah Houbolt
Synopsis: A lonely scholar, on a trip to Istanbul, discovers a Djinn who offers her three wishes in exchange for his freedom.

Title: Peter Pan & Wendy
Cast: Director:, David Lowery, | ,     Stars:, Alexander Molony, , Ever Anderson, , Jude Law, , Alyssa Wapanatâhk
Synopsis: Follow the adventures of Peter Pan, a boy who does not want to grow up, and how he recruits three siblings in London, and together they embark on a magical adventure on the enchanted island of Neverland.

Title: You
Cast: Stars:, Penn Badgley, , Victoria Pedretti, , Tati Gabrielle, , Ambyr Childers
Synopsis: A dangerously charming, intensely obsessive young man goes to extreme measures to insert himself into the lives of those he is transfixed by.

Title: Superman & Lois
Cast: Stars:, Tyler Hoechlin, , Elizabeth Tulloch, , Alex Garfin, , Erik Valdez
Synopsis: The world's most famous superhero and comic books' most famous journalist face the pressures and complexities that come with balancing work, justice, and parenthood in today's society.

Title: Love Again
Cast: Director:, Jim Strouse, | ,     Stars:, Priyanka Chopra Jonas, , Sam Heughan, , Céline Dion, , Sofia Barclay
Synopsis: A young woman tries to ease the pain of her fiancé's death by sending romantic texts to his old cell phone number, and forms a connection with the man the number has been reassigned to.
